channel.description: Recent content in manufacturing on Shoals

item.title: Following a phone case
item.description: The order is placed On CyberMonday I ordered one of those custom-printed phone case thingies because Google ran a hard sell. Can’t wait! Hmmm . . . looks like it shipped. Lemme check the status. Holy hell, it’s a map! It shows where my phone case is! Looks like it’s currently in . . . Shenzhen! Sweet! This is already a clearer window into the supply chain than what I’m accustomed to .
